cells.title: variables
cells.text-en: Create global variables and link them to any property across any layer. Experiment with your designs, keep organized, and unlock new functionality within Figma.
cells.author: Dan Araujo

cells.title: Moonvy
cells.text-en: a lightweight and yet professional design handoff platform. You can use it to generate design into specification files with a full amount of detail and share them with your team members.
cells.author: Moonvy

cells.title: Font Awesome Icons
cells.text-en: The plugin provides access to the entire free icon collection.
cells.author: Vyacheslav Myskov

cells.title: Creative Market
cells.text-en: Quickly sample thousands of ready-to-use graphics and photos for free.
cells.author: Creative Market

cells.title: Designtips.today
cells.text-en: First Chinese Figma workshop plugin that teach you how to use Figma inside Figma!
cells.author: Lichin

cells.title: Mentor
cells.text-en: The All-in-One design helper to supercharge your design process. For all beginners and pros!

cells.title: Export Variants
cells.text-en: Figma variants are neat however they can be frustrating to export since you can't control the naming scheme.
cells.author: Kevin Gutowski

cells.title: Renaming Convention
cells.text-en: Rename layer by naming cases.
cells.author: Hiroki Tani

cells.title: Complex Themes
cells.text-en: styling and painting your layouts with different color themes.
cells.author: Anton Shramko

cells.title: Fyfill
cells.text-en: With Fyfill, you can connect your Spotify account with Figma to use album cover images as fills. You can also put artist names and album titles in text nodes.
cells.author: Phil

cells.title: Reset Text Layers Name
cells.text-en: Reset all text layers name in selection at once.
cells.author: Marcin Lis

cells.title: Copy & Rotate
cells.text-en: Create radial interfaces and patterns with rotated copies of elements.
cells.author: Alexander Widua

cells.title: Crack Font
cells.text-en: This Plugin rotate each letter of a selected text box in a random angular.
cells.author: Ferdinand

cells.title: Perfect Freehand
cells.text-en: Turn vector lines into freehand strokes.
cells.author: Steve Ruiz

cells.title: Roundâ€ºâ€ºall
cells.text-en: Round everything in your document or your specific selection to the nearest whole number, respecting numerical principals of rounding.
cells.author: Karl Koch

cells.title: SeCo
cells.text-en: SeCo is a simple tool that allows you to quickly find brands & other properties from simpleicons.org.
cells.author: Leo Herrera

cells.title: Addjust
cells.text-en: The Addjust plugin adds hundreds of unique 3D illustrations and icons in PNG format to Figma.
cells.author: Alexander

cells.title: Indexer

cells.title: Icons8 Background Remover
cells.text-en: Remove background from one or many images at once!
cells.author: Icons8

cells.title: HLFTN
cells.text-en: Generate radial, linear or unform vector halftone gradients.
cells.author: Pavel Laptev

cells.title: Pattern Hero
cells.text-en: Pattern Hero enables you to place selected elements or frames in a grid to create patterns.
cells.author: Nitin Gupta

cells.title: PixCut Background Remover
cells.text-en: Want to remove background from image free? Wondershare PixCut plugin will help you to make image background transparent automatically for free.

cells.title: Contento
cells.text-en: This plugin can be used both in Figma Design and FigJam.

cells.title: A Selector
cells.text-en: A powerful tool for finding and selecting elements, you can flexibly cross select various elements by various attributes of the element.
cells.author: Xing Zhuo

cells.title: Siter.io
cells.text-en: Siter.io is a website builder that lets you create and publish entire sites without any coding at all. It works by directly exporting Figma design files without converting the designs into codes like HTML and CSS. You can make changes and adjustments directly on Siter.io, and easily import responsive versions of your designs.
cells.author: Designmodo
